website_summaries.verdict: A premium bag for those serious about nutrition, with a super roomy interior that is able to insulate for 12+ hours.
pros: This bag fits a lot of food and manages to keep items cooler for longer than other models
It's easy to clean, pack, and access
A quality design makes it resistant to wear and tear, and a comfortable strap makes it easy to travel with
It comes packaged with a variety of BPA-free containers and 3 ice packs
cons: Included containers could be better quality

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Received the item May 30th, it's now July 15th and the stitching is coming unraveled near the top. Really nice looking bag, perfect size, and it seemed like it was built solidly but it's obviously not. Guess you don't always get what you pay for...total bummer, almost perfect, guess we'll see how much longer it rides out.
customer_reviews.author: ForPJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger, but it works nicely for a full day of meals and snacks. The end shaker pockets could be just a tad bigger to make a small ice bag fit inside better. I'm a little concerned about the plastic all on the inside eventually cracking but it's holding together after a full week of use. It's a keeper so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: travel now easy
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a competition food travel bag. Good size and easy to load and get food in the containers. The only thing i am not 100% stoked on is the quality of the lids to the container. The lids are tough to get off (keeps them tight) but you can easily brake or crack the lids if you are not perfectly careful. Good quality bag, departments and straps though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Broome

customer_reviews.title: The best meal prep bag around
customer_reviews.text: The best meal prep bag around! I take this everwhere I go and never miss a meal! Definitely a great investment and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jack N Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this item for meal prep. Huge on construction sites
customer_reviews.author: Hunter k Latshaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best freaking bag ever and I've been through my fair share of bags. The color is BEAUTIFUL, it's very spacious, and overall I'm very content with my purchase. I've had a problem with their ice packs not staying cold so I just purchased better ones, other than that NO ISSUES! I'm a figure competitor so this bag is perfect for meal prep and protein shakers!
customer_reviews.author: Aki Rivz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a carry-on when flying. My food was packed in this Isobag for 11+ hours and even though I opened it up several times to get food out of it, the food was still just as cold as when I pulled it out of my refrigerator that morning. I was able to pack 13 meals and snacks in it. I will be using this every time I have to travel with food from now on. So far I've used it twice and I am extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: luvAmericanBulldogs

customer_reviews.title: This cooler bag is not that strong
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler bag but it didn’t hold up to well . Trying to see if they want to you right now to give me a hard time because you’re looking for a photo so I’m giving you one here now for everyone that uses this product because Effel that you don’t use the side pockets because it will do very easily
customer_reviews.author: Faust711

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband. He is a railroad ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He is a railroad conductor and travels for sometimes 2 days at a time. He is able to fit lots of food in this bag. The ice packs slide in and keep everything cold for 12-15 hrs until he can get to a refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as he meal preps. He absolutely loves it. He is a Journeyman Lineman and the first day he brought it to work, all his coworkers loved it and asked him where he got it so they could buy one too.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Greene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. I should’ve bought the three though. The 6 really holds like 8 of the smaller ones which I use. 6 months later and I love the 6! Longer days at school call for a lot more food, and the bag works as an amazing insulator
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a year for a shift worker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband. This bag has a great amount of space and storage areas for seperating everything. But we haven't reached a year yet and it was tearing and coming apart in areas. His major complaint was the strap. It wouldn't stay to where it was set too, and had to tie a knot to keep it in place. Container lids can break if not carefully opened but can last and work great for cold or meals that need to be heated. Ice packs do not last 2 shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Buyer

customer_reviews.title: the bad is a perfect size and has all the compartments ...
customer_reviews.text: the bag was delivered with stitching already falling apart in several places. this is not the quality I paid for or advertised. the bad is a perfect size and has all the compartments I need but, just didn't stand up to my expectations. please, if you do not want to waste money, do not buy. there are other reviews from buyers (wish I would of seen before purchasing) who had same/worse issues with theirs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and its sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I have dragged it all over the country and to Paris and Amsterdam. I basically live out of this bag on the road. The containers that come with it are kinda flimsy but I got some good Tupperware from the grocery store and its not perfect. Its wide but it really holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Best meal prep bag i have owned my only complaint is the pouch in the top compartment needs velcro to stop stuff from falling out
customer_reviews.author: Lil Deezel

customer_reviews.title: Small containers; Stays cold 12hrs
customer_reviews.text: The containers are a bit small for my liking but I guess that’s good for portion control. All in all this a fantastic meal carrier. I work outside all day and I leave it out all day and it’s still cold at the end. The ice packs are almost frozen still by the time I get home 12 hours later. Great insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect lunch box
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this lunchbox because everything in store was covered in very girly patterns or were just way too small. He absolutely loves it. He can fit his water, coffee, protein shake, breakfast, lunch, and a snack in here and he has room for an extra meal in case he works late. It was pricey when you think of a lunchbox but honestly it is actually worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: but it does at least keep it cool. The containers are also flimsy and I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is too lightly insulated to keep food cold all day, but it does at least keep it cool. The containers are also flimsy and I've had several crack when putting the lid on, or washing them. The back is well designed and I like all the pockets and storage areas.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great bag even though the price is a bit high.
customer_reviews.text: Have this bag two months now and I havent had an issue. Nice look and it keeps my stuff cool/cold all 12 hrs at work.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Meal prep in one bag
customer_reviews.text: My trainer had this bag and I had to get it. My lunch bag was starting to be too small. I purchased this bag and I can fit all my meal preps for the day in one bag and take it to work. And it comes with meal prep containers and ice packs. I highly recommend it and I can't wait to pack it on my next road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, we’ll see how it holds up, limited lifetime warranty. Made in USA
customer_reviews.author: mwilly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the bag!!! Keeps the food cold and has enough compartments for what I need. The trays appear small but they actually hold quite a bit of food and they stack nicely in the bag. I would say the only draw back I have had with this bag, is the ice lacks do take effort to slide into the slots. I would highly recommend this bag for meal preppers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!!!! Fits everything I need perfectly. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: carl hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. My husband loves it and uses it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. My husband loves it and uses it everyday. The ice packs are nice and reusable. The containers are quite sturdy. He loves using it to pack his meals. Containers and bag have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: My only negative is that I wish I was able to use some of my glass containers as opposed to the plastic ones that come with it. I can use my smaller ones, but my bigger dishes do not fit.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this bag. Had it for a few weeks and the seam is already tearing. They want you to pay $25 for a replacement. My wife bought this bag as a gift on her friends amazon account. She can’t get the receipt so now I’m stuck torn bag that I’ll have to duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: kevin judge

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I frequently travel and needed a solution for eating healthy. A bodybuilder suggested this bag and I thought I'd give it a try. I meal prep the night before my trip and in the morning I pack it up and head to the airport. As long as the icepacks are frozen there are no issues. I like the two compartments on the side for supplements or what ever and the netted pockets for my bottle shaker and water bottle. It is well designed and keeps my food very chilled, especially after my flights. I plan on buying a smaller one for when I'm not on the road and need just a day's worth of food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep food cool.
customer_reviews.text: I missed the return window trying to give this thing a chance. Do not waste your money. It doesn’t keep anything cold, no matter what ice packs you use, other brands or their iso bricks. Shouldn’t have tried to give it a chance and would not be stuck with this useless lunch bag. Be smart and spend the money on a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The best lunchbox! My husband wanted a new lunchbox to take to and from work with lots of storage space for meals. The lunchbox came with multiple, durable containers and the lunchbox itself is great quality. Would recommend this to anyone in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine F.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Room
customer_reviews.text: Good size bag, even switched to glass meal prep containers and they still fit in the bag. The zippers have held up sp far which is a problem with some bags.
customer_reviews.author: EnjoyLife2012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the fit foodie
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a meal prep bag that my husband loves! He’s been carrying around one I bought over 10 years ago. Yes, 10 years. This Isobag is the perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Green

customer_reviews.title: Well built but lacking proper containers for advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this item for it's six meal capacity. However when I opened it up they only gave me 4 large meal containers not six like I thought it was advertised. I also received about eight smaller containers that probably couldn't even hold a sandwich. I will say that the bag construction is very good and well built that's why the 3 stars but I'm disappointed I now have to spend more money to get the other 2 larger meal containers I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in US lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day for work and it keeps my food cold and intact. Has held up very well. Pleased with the construction. A big plus that it's made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: John Shahadi

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted for a week
customer_reviews.text: I have never made a negative post about any product, but I am so disappointed with this product I have to warn other buyers. First when the package arrived multiple containers were cracked and the inner storage area had minor rips. After the first use of this product the bag has severely ripped in multiple areas leaving the product unusable. Giving the price, I expected a more durable product
customer_reviews.author: IDA BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The containers are aweful, 3 came broken and they are so flimsy. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Best meal prep bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This meal prep bag is the best one I have ever used. Lots of storage and functions better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great durability and Stays cool.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for someone who meal peeps and is on the go all day. I bought this for my boyfriend and he’s used it everyday since. It keeps all his food and drinks cool for long periods of time. The containers are durable as well and perfect for packing meals.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, came with lifetime warranty. Husband Loves this bag. Keeps his food cold cold cold after 12 hours in warm manufacturin environment. Love the space.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie

customer_reviews.title: great size - needs to be more robust
customer_reviews.text: i love the size of this bag - perfect for all my meals - however the quality is not that great. the bag has already torn along the zipper line after just a few months of use. I am still on the hunt for that perfect bag that has both the size to fit my 6 meals plus shakes as well as the quality to carry them all day in and day out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag ripped out
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I used it the side ripped out along a seam. Pretty disappointed it didn't last it was a nice looking bag and I thought it was going to be awesome. Just using a cheap Walmart bag now it only cost $9.99.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would totally give it 5 if it was slightly better insulated. If i leave it on my seat ...
customer_reviews.text: # stars cause it holds all my meals for a 10 hour day, would totally give it 5 if it was slightly better insulated. If i leave it on my seat ( shaded) and go to sit i can feel moister from where the bag was sitting. Also the side compartments get really wet and if i have anything i do not want to get wet then i cannot carry them in there.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Good grub hauler
customer_reviews.text: Works great included containers are very functional included freezer packs stay cold a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Top notch bag for anyone athlete required to always be prepared with your meals.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using the bag. Ice packs seem to work well and bag seems sturdy. Time and use will be the ultimate judge.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Corley

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: For what this thing cost you would think it would keep stuff cold for awhile. Barely above room temperature by lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband. He loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves it. He is a construction worker and he loves how the bag separates everything. He can fit 4 water bottles in the sides, have room for his phone and wallet, plus keeps his hots hot and colds cold.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Almost went for the smaller one. So glad I didn't. This thing is perfect. Keeps everything cold, fits everything I carry. Built solid. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality handles seem like they will last
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for a days worth of food.Great quality handles seem like they will last. The price was a little steep almost didn't buy it but after using it for a couple of weeks glad I bought it. It's been cool so not sure how well it will keep things cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. The only annoying thing is the hand strap - you have to undo it to get the top open. But it doesn't really matter - the bag rules and has already been a life-saver on several weekends on the road. Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Westerfer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag it is durable, stays cold with ice packs, amazing amount of space and the storage containers are of very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Charise Coy

customer_reviews.title: Meal Prep Wet Dream!!
customer_reviews.text: Meal prep wet dream!! Keeps food cold the entire day. Even after I got home and forgot to unload it for 6 hours after a full work day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My partner loves it! She can do her Keto meals at work!
customer_reviews.author: Reidbbygrl

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my needs and actually a little smaller and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and it arrived a couple days ago. It is perfect for my needs and actually a little smaller and more convenient than I thought it would be from the photos. The delivery was delayed by a day, but I still received it promptly and by the time I really wanted it. The ice packs stay frozen all day, food compartments stay organized, easy to carry with me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Headrick

customer_reviews.title: Been searching for lunch bags for years. Decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for lunch bags for years. Decided to try this one out and it’s perfece. Holds a lot of food and the ice packs freeze for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysabelle

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the durable material and insulation. He didn't like the shoulder strap it came with, so he switched it out with his old bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love my ISOBAG 6 meal bag. Perfect size to accommodate all of my meals each day. Cooler packs keep everything chilled until its time to eat. I use it daily
customer_reviews.author: A. Lance

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag; not as well insulated as in the past
customer_reviews.text: Have had two other bags that were of a much better quality than this bag. No velcro to hold divider in place which was part of the other bags and not insulated as well in the top of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big box
customer_reviews.text: Love hate relationship. This lunchbox is HUGE, but it fits so much food. Just really big to lug around, but I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Havel

customer_reviews.title: Best Meal prep bag
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday, keeps meals cold at least 8 hours long. The two side drink compartments fit a shaker bottle and coffe thermos.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box , but was not expecting it to be so huge
customer_reviews.author: Abby Rios

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!! Returned
customer_reviews.text: Coming packs weren’t worth a darn. Bought to replace my 5 yr old six pack fitness cooler and the old six pack still keeps my stuff colder throughout the day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs!
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting ages to get and love it and love the containers. I can literally fit all my crap in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Maira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag, it is very well built. It keeps my food cold all day. I work roughly 12 hrs a day and it keep my food cold the entire time. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jareem

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price, plenty of space I have had no issues in the last few months
customer_reviews.author: Mario Razura

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought it would be or looks in the video but big enough and looks good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Clark

customer_reviews.title: The bag is very well insulated and stays cool like a fridge for 8+ hours
customer_reviews.text: I never cared for plastic containers, so I actually replaced them with glass ones. The bag is very well insulated and stays cool like a fridge for 8+ hours, I'm pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for use as a lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: good size compartments for additional use work, beach, whatever and plenty of containers included
customer_reviews.author: Peabo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product , very happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, perfect for everything I carry , plenty of space , I like that it's made in the USA,
customer_reviews.author: FRANCO

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. Only thing that could be better is the main pocket that stores the food have two zippers. I mean come one man, the pocket above it to store your ice packs even has two zippers. But your telling me that the biggest pocket on the thing only has one? Bruh.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: I'm a flight attendant and it's perfect for the amount of time I'm away
customer_reviews.text: I'm a flight attendant and it's perfect for the amount of time I'm away. I highly recommend this meal prep bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Casas

customer_reviews.title: This bag is so perfect. I travel a lot so I love being ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so perfect. I travel a lot so I love being able to take so many meals with me!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Christian

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: To small to fit 6 meals more like 3 full size and 2 snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is body builder and needs to eat all day. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag ever
customer_reviews.text: Best meal bag out their. Big enough to carry all my meals and more.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. My husband loves it he was so excited ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My husband loves it he was so excited he took pictures and sent to his buddy's at work thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: mary m.

customer_reviews.title: Isobag for those wanting to prep and stay on track
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and the isobag replaced my 6 pack bag that was falling apart on me.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would like to return but it had no send back label with it
customer_reviews.author: Malik Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Well constructed and does what it's supposed to. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder strap not long enough for a shoulder or hanging one side around the neck
customer_reviews.author: brent bryant

customer_reviews.title: Damaged parts
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the meal prep containers were broken at the corners and don't seal. Otherwise it's as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Oltman

customer_reviews.title: Hold plenty of food The logo fades out with black ...
customer_reviews.text: Hold plenty of food The logo fades out with black on black lettering
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zielonka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, keeps my meals and drinks cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bag, however it ripped within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sukhdeep Bhela

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food cold and fresh - great if you like to eat small meals throughout a day - and lots of room for snacks
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I work for the railroad so I needed a bag to bring all of my food for 36 to 48 hours away from home. The bag is pretty big, large enough to pack all of my meals and snacks with room to spare. It comes with plenty of food containers, but they are pretty flimsy and very cheap. I've busted 2 of them already. Sometimes I am at work for 12 plus hours, the bag won't keep my food cold for the entire time, but it works good enough for me. In my opinion, it is still a really good bag, I just think it is very overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed, Cheaply made,Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaply made alternative to a 6 pack bag. First meal inside, Black beans and chicken. The beans leaked all inside the new bag. The upper section is thin plastic, there is one giant compartment instead of sectioned off pieces so either you HAVE to carry all of the meal boxes or else the one you carry are free to flip around inside. Poorly designed and not thought out for the everyday active person who goes from board room to gym and has a life. Catch this at my next yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: C.A

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prep!
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd Gen 6 meal Isobag by Isolator Fitness is a must have for meal prep. Plenty of room and very durable. If you are a gym rat and need to have meals ready at work, or while on the road this bag does the job. Would have went for the "Isobag Blackout Edition" if it had been available at time of my purchase, but this one still looks great. A few reviews are rating this bag lower because there is no room for gym towels, gloves, belts, etc. but this is not a gym bag and is not advertised as such. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Cheap containers nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend to replace another brand one he has. His previous one would last about a year then the handle would break. I wanted to try another brand to see if it was sturdier. While the bag itself is really nice the containers are cheap plastic ones like you’d get with your takeout. The very first time my boyfriend used them they broke.
customer_reviews.author: InkyJ

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend the 6-Meal Bag
customer_reviews.text: The 6-Meal bag is not too big and is a better value. I bought this for my wife and she is delighted with it. See the accompanying photo for a size reference. It can hold a lot of food with 11 microwave safe trays and lids. It is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: ESVKTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bag so far nice quality so far and best of all it fits all of my meals and snacks. I didnt think the ice packs that came with the bag were going to keep my food cold all day but they do.....
customer_reviews.author: CTAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag , it really has a lot of room . I replaced the containers with glass ones and can fit about 6 , I have the shake bottle and the water container and put a huge box of vitamins on the top . .very well made and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lunch Box!
customer_reviews.text: I use this lunch bag as a flight attendant so I can meal prep for long 3 and 4 day trips away from home. Another flight attendant recommended it to me and it’s definitely worth it! Plenty of space for food, drinks, and snacks for out to 4 days!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space for storing other items like utensils and snacks
customer_reviews.text: Have owned it for a month now. I purchased it for both a lunch/dinner box. I work 12 hour shifts and it keeps my food cold all day long. Plenty of space for storing other items like utensils and snacks. Love the beverage cooler side pockets that are insulated as well as the mesh pockets for my blender bottle. The food prep trays work great for prepping multiple meals over several days.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my meal prep
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my meal prep, I travel for a living so this is a necessary product. I love the insulated drink (kimchi in my case!) holders on the ends. In my opinion, this back could be somewhat better insulated, as I compare it to the Luggageworks version, however the volume and the ice packs make it work!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Furrh

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! This bag has been a life-saver for almost a year now. I can keep it in my car all day and thanks to the ice packs my food will stay COLD all day. Very well-crafted and holds everything that I need for the day. They thought of everything when they designed this bag. I have received many compliments on the bag. I am HAPPY with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Meals on The Go
customer_reviews.text: This is a large well made bag. I traveled with this bag,my food was secure and remained cold . I had enough room to carry additional food items . This is a well crafted bag . How did I manage without it ,not as well. I use this bag 4 to 5 times a week . I plan on purchasing one for my daughter for mothers day. I have also spread the word about this bag at my local gym . This is one of my favorite items.
customer_reviews.author: nanna BB

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE, GREAT BUY, COMPACT, FITS PLENTY
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband because he had a pack 6 one & it was falling apart. He NEEDED one with plenty of room and we got it. It fits all his meals & shaker cups easily. I was surprised that it was so compact especially compared to the massive one he had. But, we love it. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherity Petty

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice meal prep bag. Perfect for what it’s used for. Durability will be determined over time but a bit worried about seams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag just wish the quality was better especially ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the bag since the start of the year and the stitching around one of the cup holders is ripping all the way down the side. Love the bag just wish the quality was better especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend ABSOLUTELY loved it and it seems very well built!
customer_reviews.author: Jude Landry

product_meta.title: Isolator Fitness Meal Prep Lunch Box ISOBAG - Large Insulated 6 Meal Prep Bag/Cooler with 12 Containers, 3 Ice Packs & Shoulder Strap (Blackout) - Made in USA
feature_bullets: ✔️ ⚠️ RECEIVE 10% OFF MEAL PREP CONTAINERS & ISOBRICKS WITH YOUR PURCHASE OF AN ISOLATOR FITNESS 6 MEAL ISOBAG! VISIT THE SPECIAL OFFERS & PROMOTIONS SECTION TO SAVE 💲 TODAY ⚠️

✔️ HIGH QUALITY! This durable ISOBAG is the ULTIMATE meal management system! It is fully insulated and designed to keep your food cold for 12-16 hours.❄️ It features an insulated top loading compartment & a zippered front-loading compartment that provides EASY access to your meal prep containers. The 6 Meal ISOBAG has 2 zippered, insulated side compartments, 2 outside mesh pockets & 1 small mesh pocket in the top loading compartment of the bag. Side of the bag features a spot for your ISOSHAKER!

✔️ 1️⃣2️⃣ MEAL PREP CONTAINERS INCLUDED! Isolator Fitness Meal Prep Containers are BPA-free, microwave and dishwasher safe, freezable, stackable, reusable, AND recyclable!✅ 4 different size food containers are included to meet your personal dietary needs: (2) 12oz, (6) 16oz, (2) 28oz, & (2) 38oz. These containers are perfect for portion control and staying on track with your nutritional plan!💪 The ISOBAG can hold up to 8 at a time depending on the size of the containers placed in the bag!

✔️ MADE IN THE USA🇺🇸! ALL Isolator Fitness Meal Prep Bags are hand assembled in Reading, PA! The 6 Meal ISOBAG weighs 5.5lbs (no food), measures 18" x 9.5" x 8", includes an adjustable shoulder strap and handle (for convenience and comfort), and 3 (12oz) leak proof ISOBRICKS❄️. The ISOBAG has a lifetime warranty on our American made zippers and stitching - with registration.

✔️ CONVENIENT FOR BUSY LIVES! The 6 Meal ISOBAG is the most ideal bag for men and women leading busy, health conscious lifestyles! This meal prep bag is large enough to hold a meal container for your breakfast, lunch, dinner AND a snack! The ISOBAG will help you avoid making poor food choices by providing you with healthy prepared meals throughout your busy day! Invest In yourself and buy the best, ISOBAG!👌🏼
